document_data.mainbody:
Avbrauve Haltorel was a retired warrior and fishmonger inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Avbrauve was the guildmaster for the Fishmongers Fellowship circa 1357 DR. He held the title of "Master Fishmonger" within the guild and worked out of Seaswealth Hallâ€“their headquarters on the wharfs in the Dock Ward.
